channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 61
channel.description:
In this episode, Ian and Andrey talk about new hardware, Star Wars, HelpSpot Cloud, back-end systems, Quantic Insights, virtual insurance for virtual crap, and fantasy football.
[Download Bootstrapped.fm, episode 61.][1]
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring the show this week.
Get $10 off (1 free month of a 1GB server) with code **bootstrapped10** https://promo.linode.com/bootstrappedfm
[1]: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-61/

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 61
item.dc:creator: shantnu
item.description:
Wow. Did you guys read some productivity book or something? The Dummies Guide to producing a podcast a week. I remember when months went by with no episode.

Not that Iâ€™m complaining! Keep 'em coming.
